species.name: natu
descriptions: Although it still can’t fly, its jumping power is outstanding. It jumps way up into trees and plucks the buds from the branches.
Because its wings aren't yet fully grown, it has to hop to get around. It is always staring at something.
It is extremely good at climbing tree trunks and likes to eat the new sprouts on the trees.
It picks food from cactus plants, deftly avoiding buds and spines. It seems to skip about to move.
It runs up short trees that grow on the savanna to peck at new shoots. A NATU’s eyes look as if they are always observing something.

abilities.name: synchronize
abilities.effect: Copies burns, paralysis, and poison received onto the Pokémon that inflicted them.

abilities.name: early-bird
abilities.effect: Makes sleep pass twice as quickly.

abilities.name: magic-bounce
abilities.effect: Reflects most non-damaging moves back at their user.
